name: contextually
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is related to the context of something: Children frequently fail to select the contextually appropriate meaning. Advertisers are charged for contextually relevant links and advertisements. See
contextual
More examplesFewer examplesIntellectual and political strategies can only be understood contextually.The two terms are contextually equivalent.Assessments of what is reasonable are contextually specific to the incident.
